data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Golden Master
data.expected_result: The app should show you an error message that the camera is disabled.
data.short_description: App crashes when trying to take a photo or video with disabled camera app
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your iOS settings app - Open Screen Time > Restrictions (for iOS 11 and below go to General > Restrictions) - Enable Restrictions - Go to Allowed Apps and toggle the Camera app - Now go back to the Discord app - Click on the paperclip - Try to take a photo or video
